allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Complete deployment configuration and documentation

Major updates:
- Added comprehensive deployment guides (cPanel, Heroku, Railway, VPS)
- Configured production settings with environment variables
- Replaced mysqlclient with PyMySQL for cPanel compatibility
- Added deployment scripts (setup_deployment.py, create_superuser.py, run_migrations.py)
- Created deployment helpers (BUILD_FRONTEND.bat, passenger_wsgi.py, .htaccess)
- Updated frontend to use environment variables for API URL
- Added user admin customization (Romanian field labels)
- Enhanced search UI with latest manifest info and home button
- Added country name field to Pavilion model with tooltip display
- Implemented number sumara delimiter splitting (;,)
- Fixed CORS and CSRF settings for production
- Added WhiteNoise for static files serving
- Created detailed troubleshooting guides

New features:
- Multi-year database support with automatic filtering
- Auto-sync for container types, ships, and pavilions
- Latest manifest display with ship name
- Home button to clear search results
- Flag tooltip with country name
- Enhanced admin interface with image previews

Documentation:
- DEPLOY_ACUM.md - Quick deployment guide with Terminal/SSH
- DEPLOY_FARA_TERMINAL.md - Deployment without Terminal access
- INSTALL_SIMPLU.md - Simplified step-by-step installation
- CPANEL_DEPLOYMENT.md - Detailed cPanel deployment guide
- DEPLOYMENT.md - General deployment guide for multiple platforms
- FIX_MYSQL_ERROR.md - Solution for mysqlclient compilation issues
- README.md - Complete project documentation
- CHECKLIST_DEPLOYMENT.txt - Visual deployment checklist
